parameters.name: parameterObject
parameters.description: Sets the padding and spacing properties. If padding is set to a number, that value will be used for all four edge values.

spacing.description: Additional space to add between the children in device independent pixel.

alignment.description: Determines the horizontal placement of the children.

default.description: Instance of StackLayout used as the default `layout` property value of `StackComposite` widgets. Equivalent to `new StackLayout()`
